FuncDef: This command monitors scheduler statistics in a port queue group or a VPORT.
CLIs: [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ access | network ] [ instance <instance-id> ]
port <port-id> vport <name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies statistics are for an ingress queue group.
Specifies statistics are for an egress queue group.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures the number of times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays scheduler statistics applied on an access port.
Displays scheduler statistics applied on a network port.
Displays statistics for the named Vport up to 32 characters in length.
